azurerm_monitor_scheduled_query_rules_lo.description: Manages a LogToMetricAction Scheduled Query Rules resources within Azure Monitor

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the scheduled query rule instance.

data_source_id.description: The resource uri over which log search query is to be run.

description.description: The description of the scheduled query rule.

enabled.description: Whether this scheduled query rule is enabled.  Default is `true`.

metric_name.description: Name of the metric.  Supported metrics are listed in the Azure Monitor [Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/platform/metrics-supported#microsoftoperationalinsightsworkspaces

id.description: The ID of the scheduled query rule.

create.description: Used when creating the Scheduled Query Rule Log.

update.description: Used when updating the Scheduled Query Rule Log.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Scheduled Query Rule Log.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Scheduled Query Rule Log.
